feature.name: Gunlance Proficiency
feature.text: You are proficient with the Gunlance, a special weapon unique to your class. It is considered a martial weapon with the loading, two-handed, and special properties.

feature.name: Shell Gauge
feature.text: You gain a shell gauge with a number of charges. These are used to perform explosive techniques. The gauge refills after a long rest.

feature.name: Wyvern's Fire
feature.text: You can unleash a powerful blast from your Gunlance. Once per long rest, deal 4d10 fire damage in a 30-foot line (DEX save half).

feature.name: Artillery Style
feature.text: Choose between Normal, Long, or Wide shelling styles, altering the effect of your explosive attacks.

feature.name: Advanced Shelling
feature.text: Your Gunlance damage and shelling capacity increase. Add an extra die of damage when using shell techniques.

feature.name: True Wyvern’s Fire
feature.text: You can now use Wyvern’s Fire twice per long rest, and its damage increases to 6d10 fire damage.
